name: ListeningServicesPS
description: Retrieve listening services overview via powershell (using netstat and tasklist)
snippet: powershell -ep bypass -nop $ports=netstat -ano | findstr LISTEN; $ports[4..$ports.length] | ConvertFrom-String -PropertyNames Name
column9: PID | foreach { $_.Name = (tasklist /FO CSV | convertfrom-csv | where PID -eq $_.PID)."Image Name"; $_ } | Format-Table -AutoSize
